marklogic.body:
I think that the race-monger leaders, politicians, and media are overwhelming the probable cause and due process paradigm of American law, trying to make it fall apart. It's like they're telling America: No evidence to arrest Zimmerman for Cold-blooded, racially motivated, premeditated murder of 17 year old Trayvon Martin, the little 10 year old child whose smiling photo we see on TV news every day? Find some -- make it up or we'll make all hell break loose -- we can, you know! Zimmerman is guilty because we say so! This is an effort to change the paradigm of law in America. Turn it into vigilanteism, instead. Do you think the 5,000 black men mobilized by Black Panthers to hunt down Zimmerman will go home and not do it again when they're told to? They are throwing down the gauntlet: Stop us if you dare.
If you want things like this to continue and get worse, keep doing what our so-called leaders tell you to do, ignore their crimes and Always react to their incitement and empowerment to damage other people for the sake of "retaliation".
